data.text: @FoMohale @bonglez @HealthZA @GCISMedia @WHOSouthAfrica @dailymaverick @miamalan No one cares anymore Russia is in war

@FoMohale @HealthZA @GCISMedia @WHOSouthAfrica @dailymaverick @bonglez @miamalan Recovery rate is 96%  a very small percent of those who recovered are vaccinated. Majority of those who recovered are not vaccinated; their immune system did the things to make covid go away. 

Those who vaccinated & survived not a single scientists can prove that vaccine helped

@FoMohale @bonglez @HealthZA @GCISMedia @WHOSouthAfrica @dailymaverick @miamalan Words alone won’t express how thankful I’m recommending you all to @bettycostafx. investing with her has been a great opportunity for me and my family, I'm not persuading anyone to work with Mrs @bettycostafx.. I just wanted interested investors to make the right choice with her.

@FoMohale @bonglez @HealthZA @GCISMedia @WHOSouthAfrica @dailymaverick @miamalan I still ask today, can we track daily stats for more issues that are important to our development and growth as a country.

@Rowley57S @bonglez @HealthZA @GCISMedia @WHOSouthAfrica @dailymaverick @miamalan Vaccinate so we continue to report zero deaths, fewer infection cases, higher recovery rates, relieve pressure from our hardworking healthcare workers, faster economic recovery, lift restrictions, save lives and live hoods, and so forth and so forth
